slide-1.title: How to Play
content: This is a game where a small ball is thrown into a spinning wheel that has 37 slots numbered from 0 to 36.

slide-2.title: Betting
content: You can bet on numbers, number ranges, colors, or whether the outcome is odd or even. Once your bet is placed, the wheel is spun and a ball is thrown in.

slide-3.title: Game Outcome
content: The ball will stop in one of the slots, and any bets that match the result will win.
